solution_line_template: There are {indoor_tables} indoor tables * {chairs_per_indoor_table} chairs = <<{indoor_tables}*{chairs_per_indoor_table}={indoor_chairs}>>{indoor_chairs} chairs.
There are {outdoor_tables} outdoor tables * {chairs_per_outdoor_table} chairs = <<{outdoor_tables}*{chairs_per_outdoor_table}={outdoor_chairs}>>{outdoor_chairs} chairs.
The total number of chairs is {indoor_chairs} chairs + {outdoor_chairs} chairs = <<{indoor_chairs}+{outdoor_chairs}={total_chairs}>>{total_chairs} chairs.
